item.title: Automating your web browser with selenium
item.author: 4rkal
item.description: Selenium is a very good skill to have as you can automate almost everything that you can do with a web browser. In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to use Python and Selenium to automate a web browser. This is an updated version of my previous article which unfortunately doesn’t work anymore. If you’re a complete beginner, read my python article to understand the basics. (https://4rkal.medium.com/f1df170bcc08/python-for-beginners) What is selenium? Selenium is an open source umbrella project for a range of tools and libraries aimed at supporting browser automation.
